name: Netsh Firewall Rule Deletion
description: Detects the removal of a port or application rule in the Windows Firewall configuration using netsh
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*firewall* AND process.command_line:*delete*) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:*\\Dropbox.exe AND process.command_line:*name\=Dropbox*)))`
